name: Travel2 App
text: A collaborative project which solves a real-world problem by integrating data received from multiple server-side API requests - using server-side APIs, HTML, JS and CSS.

name: Bored?
text: A collaborative front-end, single-page application using React front end to build a user-focused platform - using React and NPM modules.

name: Bootstrap Portfolio
text: A responsive portfolio site - using Bootstrap and custom styling in CSS.

name: Team Profile Generator
text: An application that generates HTML files using input from Node.js command-line.

name: Weather Dashboard
text: A weather dashboard that runs in the browser and retrieves data from server APIs - created with JS, HTML and CSS.

name: Password Generator
text: A password generator with dynamically updated HTML and CSS.
